metadata.description: A short name for the workload being deployed
The environment for which the deployment is being executed
The user name to be used as the Administrator for all VMs created by this deployment
The password for the Administrator user for all VMs created by this deployment
The CI/CD platform to be used, and for which an agent will be configured for the ASE deployment. Specify 'none' if no agent needed
The Azure DevOps or GitHub account name to be used when configuring the CI/CD agent, in the format https://dev.azure.com/ORGNAME OR github.com/ORGUSERNAME OR none
The Azure DevOps or GitHub personal access token (PAT) used to setup the CI/CD agent
Azure location to which the resources are to be deployed
Standardized suffix text to be added to resource names
Indicator as to whether the CI/CD agent subnet should be created or not
CIDR prefix to use for Hub VNet
CIDR prefix to use for Spoke VNet
CIDR prefix to use for Bastion VNet
CIDR prefix to use CI/CD Agent VNet
CIDR prefix to use for Jumpbox VNet
CIDR prefix to use for ASE
Azure location to which the resources are to be deployed
The full id string identifying the target subnet for the jumpbox VM
The full id string identifying the target subnet for the CI/CD Agent VM
The user name to be used as the Administrator for all VMs created by this deployment
The password for the Administrator user for all VMs created by this deployment
The CI/CD platform to be used, and for which an agent will be configured for the ASE deployment. Specify 'none' if no agent needed
The Azure DevOps or GitHub account name to be used when configuring the CI/CD agent, in the format https://dev.azure.com/ORGNAME OR github.com/ORGUSERNAME OR none
The Azure DevOps or GitHub personal access token (PAT) used to setup the CI/CD agent
The name of the shared resource group

Azure location to which the resources are to be deployed

Azure location to which the resources are to be deployed
The full id string identifying the target subnet for the VM
Disk type of the IS disk
Valid SKU indicator for the VM
The user name to be used as the Administrator for all VMs created by this deployment
The password for the Administrator user for all VMs created by this deployment
Windows OS Version indicator
Name of the VM to be created
Indicator to guide whether the CI/CD agent script should be run or not
The Azure DevOps or GitHub account name
The personal access token to connect to Azure DevOps or Github
The name Azure DevOps or GitHub pool for this build agent to join. Use 'Default' if you don't have a separate pool.
The CI/CD platform to be used, and for which an agent will be configured for the ASE deployment. Specify 'none' if no agent needed

The base URI where the CI/CD agent artifacts required by this template are located. When the template is deployed using the accompanying scripts, a private location in the subscription will be used and this value will be automatically generated.

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [format('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command ./agentsetup.ps1 -url {0} -pat {1} -agent {2} -pool {3} -agenttype {4} ', parameters('accountName'), parameters('personalAccessToken'), variables('AgentName'), parameters('poolName'), parameters('CICDAgentType'))]

metadata.description: Azure location to which the resources are to be deployed
Id of the subnet within which the VM must be created
The private IP address to associated with this VM
Name of the VM to be created
Azure location to which the resources are to be deployed
The mode for the internal load balancing configuration to be applied to the ASE load balancer
The name of the subnet to be used for ASE
The full id string identifying the target subnet for the ASE
The full id string identifying the target vnet for the ASE
The number of workers to be deployed in the worker pool
Specify the worker pool size SKU (1, 2, or 3) to be created
String to append to resources as part of naming standards
